NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color> Clue: There is another QM locator on BH and you can learn to use the rule of imaging from afar there?
1
COLEUS: Melorae, are you ready? We are about to begin our first expedition to the Quantum Moon!
2
1
MELORAE: Of course, Coleus. I have looked forward to this expedition ever since our reunion with our friends on Brittle Hollow, and learning of our shared passion for this wandering moon!
3 2
MELORAE: But.. where is Thatch? He was supposed to travel here from Brittle Hollow to meet with us at the Quantum Moon Locator before we set off, was he not?
4
3
COLEUS: We have waited for some time, but Thatch has still not arrived. Could your nephew have lost his way, Melorae? Or..
5
4
COLEUS: Could he have confused our instructions for another <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator?</color>
6
5
MELORAE: But Coleus, this is the only Quantum Moon Locator we know of! Unless..
7
6
MELORAE: Could our friends on Brittle Hollow have built a second Quantum Moon Locator we were not aware of?
8
7
COLEUS: That is likely.. Our friends on Brittle Hollow would have surely come up with a similar plan to track a wandering moon.. Though I am deeply curious how differently their locator might function from ours!
9
8
COLEUS: Perhaps they might even have devised a way to track where the Quantum Moon goes when it disappears completely!
10
9
MELORAE: How you make my heart flutter with possibilities, Coleus!
11
10
MELORAE: Seeing as we cannot begin the expedition without him, we should travel to Brittle Hollow to try to find Thatch.. as well as to seek out this hypothetical second <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator!</color>
BH_QML R1 4
R_SLR R3 5
BH_QML R3 5
